description: Begonia 'Art Hodes' is an amazing flowering plant species with large and beautiful flowers with orange and yellow streaked petals. It's an ideal choice for any garden due to its resilience and ease of care. Its glossy green foliage is perfect for providing texture and interest in the garden. This hardy plant adds a beautiful pop of colour to beds and containers and shares a dear friendliness with all other companion plants. Its exotic shape and bright flowers can also provide a great backdrop to other plants in flower beds. As a bonus, Begonia is also deer resistant! Plant this begonia and you're sure to have a real show stopper in your garden.
